txt.en:
I Believe it is February
Voices above. Footsteps. They came then left again.
They have found my home. Soon they'll find the caves … and they'll come to take it back.
My necklace.
Well. THEY CAN'T HAVE IT!!!
I shall build defences. I need to protect it. To keep it SAFE.

Spring has Come
Traps! Traps EVERYWHERE! They will DIE if they set foot in my HOME. The necklace tells me I should do MORE … I MUST protect it BETTER. It asks for things … it wants MORE HELP. Yes. An army of its own. It told me how. I know the secret!

Next Day
They LIVE again! My lads! Yes. My lovely necklace has brought them BACK to me! They don't speak a word, but they WORK … oh, they all work SO hard. Yes! MUCH harder than BEFORE. It is like a dream A BEAUTIFUL DREAM

---

Something has happened. Yes the lads TURNED on me AGAIN. I thought they were my FRIENDS but yesterday Khedem tried to GRAB me and yes today Tunon BIT my ARM. I know WHY. Yes. They want the necklace. Yes they ALL do YES. But they won't HAVE it. I won't LET them. Yes I put it AWAY where THEY can't find it. I will keep it SAFE. Yes and I will lock MYSELF in so the lads LEAVE ME ALONE!!!

---

My fault. Why they came back to me, if all they want is eating? WHY? Don't KNOW! Wasn't I GOOD to them? NOW. I am TRAPPED here my self. WITHOUT MY NECKLACE! Yes. I HAVE LOST IT! Banging on door. I here there BONES scrapping aganst the WALLS. I am felling so weak, to week to rite

---

all is silent the end is near. only thing left is to sleep. necklace has betrayed me no reason to live

---

IN THE DARK I BLEED WITH MY AXE
YES
MY FRIENDS HAVE COME THEY WILL NOT HAVE ME
SO HEAVY TASTES LIKE IRON IN MY MOUTH
